input: Ma ná ngwụsị afọ ndị 1990 ,kwa afọ a tọọrọ ihe e mere atụmatụ ya ịbụ malite na mmadụ 20,000 ruo 30,000 .
target: But in the late 1990 ’ s ,an estimated 20,000 to 30,000 people were kidnapped each year .

target: In Guatemala an 84 - year - old woman in a wheelchair was abducted and held captive for two months .

target: In Rio de Janeiro ,street thugs are snatching people right off the street ,sometimes demanding as little as 100 in ransom .

input: Inshọransị maka ịtọrọ mmadụ bụ́ nke a na - agbata n’ụlọ ọrụ Lloyd’s of London ejiriwo pasent 50 mụbaa kwa afọ kemgbe 1990 .
